General.Name: Eterindo Wahanatama Tbk
General.Description: PT Eterindo Wahanatama Tbk produces and sells biodiesel in Indonesia and internationally. It also trades in chemical products; and engages in oil palm plantation and derivative product business. PT Eterindo Wahanatama Tbk was founded in 1992 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Eterindo Wahanatama Tbk operates as a subsidiary of Pt Mordred Investama Indonesia.
